italic title Taxobox regnum = [[Animal]]ia phylum = [[Arthropod]]a classis = [[Insect]]a ordo = [[Beetle|Coleoptera]] subordo = [[Polyphaga]] familia = [[Cerambycidae]] genus = '''''[[Ropica (genus)|Ropica]]''''' species = '''''R. biroi''''' binomial = ''Ropica biroi'' binomial_authority = Breuning, 1953 synonyms =
'''''Ropica biroi''''' is a species of [[beetle]] in the family [[Cerambycidae]]. It was described by [[Stephan von Breuning (entomologist)|Breuning]] in 1953.ref[http://www.biolib.cz/en/taxon/id487209/ BioLib.cz - ''Ropica biroi'']. Retrieved on 8 September 2014.</ref>
